name: 黃玲媛
objective:
The course surveys the principles of chemistry and properties of matter which interest the engineers most. It will place more emphasis on conceptual understanding. It is designed to provide the chemical engineering major the background in modern chemistry that students need to serve their professional interests.
Course Outline:
1. Basic Concepts of Chemical Bonding
2. Molecular Geometry and Bonding Theories
3. Gases
4. Intermolecular Forces; Some Properties of Liquids; Phase Changes; Vapor Pressure; Phase Diagrams; Bonding in Solids
5. Properties of Solutions
6. Chemical Kinetics
7. Chemical Equilibrium
8. Acid-Base Equilibria
